SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.view.TextualInterfaceUnit

类 Tui

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TextualInterfaceUnit.Tui
所有已实现的接口:
Ui
public class Tui extends Object implements Ui
The `Tui` class represents a Text User Interface for a game, implementing the `Ui` interface. It handles user interactions, game state management, and communication with the server.
另请参阅:
  • Ui

    • Tui

      public Tui() throws IOException
      Constructor for the Tui class. Initializes the Tui and sets up the initial game state.
      抛出:
      IOException - if there is an error reading from the standard input.

  • 方法详细资料

    • init

      public void init() throws Exception
      Initializes the game by setting up the connection type, logging in, and starting the game loop.
      抛出:
      Exception - if there is an error during initialization.

    • askConnectionType

      public String askConnectionType()
      Asks the user to choose the connection type (RMI or Socket).

    • askToContinue

      public void askToContinue()
      Waits for the user to press Enter to continue.

    • askLogin

      public void askLogin() throws Exception
      Asks the user to enter their username.
      抛出:
      Exception - if there is an error during the login process.

    • askMenuAction

      public void askMenuAction() throws Exception
      Asks the user to choose an action from the menu.
      抛出:
      Exception - if there is an error during menu action selection.

    • askJoinFirst

      public void askJoinFirst() throws InterruptedException, RemoteException
      Sends a request to join the game session first.
      抛出:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during communication.

    • askSetReady

      public void askSetReady() throws InterruptedException, RemoteException
      Asks the player if they are ready to start and sends their readiness status to the server.
      抛出:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during communication.

    • askPlayCard

      public void askPlayCard() throws InterruptedException, RemoteException
      Asks the player to choose a card, position, and orientation to play, then sends the chosen card's information to the server.
      抛出:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during communication.

    • askChat

      public void askChat() throws RemoteException, InterruptedException
      Asks the player to whom they want to send a message and the content of the message, then sends the chat message to the appropriate recipient(s) on the server.
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during communication.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while sleeping.

    • askCreateMatch

      public void askCreateMatch() throws Exception
      Asks the player if they want to create a match with auto-start option, and sends the match creation request to the server.
      抛出:
      Exception - if an error occurs during match creation.

    • askJoinMatch

      public void askJoinMatch() throws Exception
      Asks the player to enter the ID of the match they want to join, then sends the join request to the server.
      抛出:
      Exception - if an error occurs during match joining.

    • askExitGame

      public boolean askExitGame() throws RemoteException
      Exits the game.
      返回:
      always returns false (unreachable code due to System.exit(0)).
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs during communication.

    • showCommonGoals

      public void showCommonGoals() throws IOException
      Displays the common target cards for the current match.
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while printing the cards.

    • showPersonalGoal

      public void showPersonalGoal() throws IOException
      Displays the personal target card of the player.
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while printing the card.

    • showBoard

      public void showBoard()
      Displays the game board with current positions and values. Uses a grid layout with coordinates.

    • redirect

      public void redirect() throws Exception
      Handles redirection to appropriate game state methods based on the current status.
      抛出:
      Exception - if there is an error during redirection.

    • prepareGame

      public void prepareGame() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Prepares the game by setting up the board, choosing colors, and initializing game elements.
      抛出:
      IOException - if there is an error reading from the standard input.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game and displays the final scores and winners.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Draws a card from the deck.
      抛出:
      IOException - if there is an error reading from the standard input.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • inGame

      public void inGame() throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Handles in-game actions such as playing cards, chatting, and viewing game elements.
      抛出:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.
      IOException - if there is an error reading from the standard input.
